title: Google News Article
description: Structured data for a scraped Google News article with full text content and metadata

query.title: Search Query
query.description: The original search query used to find this article

title.title: Article Title
title.description: The full title of the news article including source attribution

url.title: Article URL
url.description: The URL of the article (may be Google News URL or resolved article URL)

source.title: News Source
source.description: The name of the news publication or website

publishedAt.title: Publication Date
publishedAt.description: When the article was published (ISO 8601 format)

author.title: Author
author.description: The author of the article (if available)

text.title: Article Text
text.description: The main text content of the article extracted from RSS feed or article page

description.title: Article Description
description.description: A brief description or summary of the article

images.title: Images
images.description: Array of image URLs found in the article

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Relevant tags or keywords for the article

language.title: Language
language.description: The language of the article content

scrapedAt.title: Scraped At
scrapedAt.description: When this article was scraped (ISO 8601 format)

extractionSuccess.title: Extraction Success
extractionSuccess.description: Whether the content extraction was successful
